aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-5114-633 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 25/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 27/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 27/12/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 31/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 31/12/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component.
Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
